snippet: Friday’s highlights from around the Web include news of an advertising partnership between Google’s DoubleClick and Facebook’s FBX. Plus, a conversation with director Spike Jonze on his new film, “Her,” and our bonds with mobile devices.
abstract: Friday’s highlights from around the Web include news of an advertising partnership between Google’s DoubleClick and Facebook’s FBX. Plus, a conversation with director Spike Jonze on his new film, “Her,” and our bonds with mobile devices.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Google and Facebook Partner on Ads, and Talk to Me, Siri
